description: From their Eiger Extreme collection: the Eiswand Advanced ML Hooded Jacket Men. Pontetorto® Tecnowool®’s waffle structure provides this mid-layer with optimum moisture management on the inside. Abrasion-resistant ceramic print in areas subject to particular stress ensures durability. Flat seams offer maximum comfort. Eiswand Advanced ML Hooded Jacket Men – a performance-orientated mid-layer.
name: Mammut Eiswand Advanced ML Hooded Jacket - Mens
